SEO.title: Healthy Instinct | Holistic Well-being & Numerology
SEO.description: Explore your path to integral well-being with essential oils, Pythagorean numerology, and ancestral wisdom. Awaken your instinct today.
SEO.og_description: We accompany your healing and self-knowledge process with high-vibration holistic tools.

hero.title: Awaken Your Instinct
hero.subtitle: Find the perfect balance between body, mind, and spirit.

features.numerology_desc: Discover the map of your soul and destiny through numbers.
features.radio_desc: Music and content to raise your vibration 24/7.
features.oils_desc: Pure aromatherapy to heal and harmonize your environment.

footer.tagline: Your digital refuge for healing, self-knowledge and holistic wellness. Discover the power of your own energy.

Numerology.title: YOUR NAME IN NUMEROLOGY
Numerology.subtitle: Discover how the letters of your name influence your destiny

long_cycles.title: Long Cycles: Personal Year & Month
long_cycles.desc: Your Personal Year changes every January 1st (or on your birthday depending on configuration) and lasts 12 months. It represents the general trend of the year. The Personal Month gives you the 'flavor' of each month.

powerful_advice.title: Powerful Advice
powerful_advice.desc: At the start of your Personal Year: read the full annual forecast, mark strong months on your calendar (e.g., month 8 for finances, month 6 for relationships, month 9 for closures). Plan important actions aligning them with those months.

practical_tips.title: Practical Tips
practical_tips.colors: Favorable Colors: wear them in clothes/accessories.
practical_tips.numbers: Lucky Numbers: choose dates with them.
practical_tips.crystals: Stones/Crystals: carry them to important appointments.
practical_tips.hours: Power Hours/Days: set aligned affirmations (e.g., if you are a 7 ‚Üí 'I trust my intuition').

compatibility.title: Explore Compatibilities
compatibility.desc: Calculate with partners, business associates, children, pets, projects, or brands. Understand dynamics and where to place your awareness.

form.email_help: Enter your email to receive the full reading and daily tips.
form.email_error: Your email is required to proceed

tooltips.destiny: Destiny: Sum of all letters in the full name.
tooltips.life_path: Life Path: Calculated by summing all digits of your date (DD+MM+YYYY) reducing to 1-9 or Master (11, 22, 33).

footer.ebook_link: Get my complete Numerology eBook at www.InstintoSaludable.com
footer.copyright: Ancestral Wisdom ‚Ä¢ Destiny Portal ‚Ä¢ Sacred Numerology

synergy.title: Soul Synastry
synergy.subtitle: First calculate your own numerology in the main tab to view compatibility.

result.color_desc: This space vibrates in color frequencies that you can enhance by decorating with these tones.

1.title: The Leader
1.love: Seeks partners who respect their independence.

2.title: The Peacemaker
2.love: Values deep emotional connection and harmony.

3.title: The Communicator
3.career: Writer, artist, sales, or public relations.

4.title: The Builder
4.challenges: Rigidity or lack of creative vision.

5.title: The Adventurer
5.love: Needs freedom, travel, and constant adventure.

6.title: The Nurturer
6.strengths: Care, compassion, and sense of community.
6.love: Dedicated, family-oriented, and protector of their home.

7.title: The Seeker
7.love: Needs personal space and intellectual connection.

8.title: The Executive
8.love: Seeks material stability and shared status.

9.title: The Humanitarian
9.challenges: Excessive sentimentality or lack of practicality.
9.love: Universal love, romantic, and deeply empathetic.

11.title: The Intuitive (Master Number)
11.challenges: Extreme anxiety or daydreaming without action.
11.career: Spiritual leader, healer, or motivational coach.

22.title: The Master Builder
22.personality: Practical yet visionary, immense capacity for realization.
22.strengths: Ability to manifest big dreams into reality.
22.challenges: Fear of failure in the face of great responsibilities.
22.love: Building a legacy together with their partner.
22.career: Large-scale architect, philanthropist, or visionary leader.

33.title: The Master Teacher
33.strengths: Great teaching ability and personal sacrifice.
33.love: Pure, protective, and deeply nourishing love.
33.career: Spiritual guide, great educator, or world peace leader.

partner.1: Vibration of shared leadership. Building a visionary future together.
partner.2: Perfect harmony. Deep mutual support and sensitivity.
partner.3: Relationship full of joy, communication, and creative expression.
partner.4: Stability and loyalty. Building a solid foundation for the home.
partner.5: Adventure and freedom. A dynamic relationship that never stops.
partner.6: Nurturing and protective love. The home is their sanctuary.
partner.7: Spiritual and intellectual connection. Seeking deep truth together.
partner.8: Power and material abundance. An unstoppable team.
partner.9: Universal and compassionate love. Inspiring each other to be better.
partner.11: Master relationship. Intensely connected spiritual evolution.
partner.22: Great builders of a joint legacy.
partner.33: Healing and mutual guidance. Love in its highest expression of service.

business_partner.1: Total focus on goals and innovative results.
business_partner.4: Organization and hard work. Success assured by structure.
business_partner.8: Great financial potential and projection of authority.

child.2: Requires gentle guidance and emotional patience.
child.6: A bond of protection and teaching based on family love.

pet.3: Cheerful pet bringing lots of communication and laughter to the home.
pet.5: Playful and energetic pet. Needs lots of space.
pet.9: Telepathic or very intuitive connection. A soul companion.

compatibility.default: There is an energy of balance and cooperation between both.

1.advice: Ideal for new beginnings and independence.

3.advice: Space for social life and artistic expression.

4.advice: Excellent for working and building solid foundations.

5.advice: A dynamic home with constant movement.

6.advice: Meeting point for family and mutual care.

7.advice: Refuge for deep study and introspection.

8.advice: Attracts material success and efficient management.

9.advice: Space for healing and unconditional love.
